name: Sangre
description:
Sangre is a horror game where the objective is to collect as many crowns as possible, the more crowns you have the more dangerous the game becomes. Only players who exercise extreme avarice can win. 

The controls are WASD to move, SPACE to jump, LEFT CLICK to zoom in, and ESCAPE to quit game.  ALSO DON'T FORGET TO USE LEFT SHIFT TO RUN!!!

This is the first game I have ever made, enjoy.
